issue.title: [Developer][Archery] Change items_per_seconds units
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11539](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11539). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Antoine requested that I change the units in `items_per_seconds_fmt` to be:

- K items/sec
- M items/sec
- G items/sec
  
  Rather than:
  
- k items/sec
- m items/sec
- b items/sec

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11539?focusedCommentId=17283665) by David Li (lidavidm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9433
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9433>
